headline: TTD vs. PUBM: Which Ad-Tech Stock Is the Smarter Pick Now?
summary: The Trade Desk and PubMatic tap booming CTV and retail media trends, but rising competition, AI bets and valuation gaps set up a high-stakes ad-tech showdown.

headline: Benchmark Maintains Buy on Trade Desk, Lowers Price Target to $40
summary: Benchmark  analyst Mark Zgutowicz   maintains Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) with a Buy and lowers the price target from $65 to $40.
